name: 蒼葉
message: "...Phew."
After showering, I head for the living room while drying my hair with the towel around my neck.
Granny is watching TV while sipping tea. Koujaku isn't there.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Where's Koujaku?"

name: タエ
message: "He went upstairs. To your room, I imagine."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Oh. ...By the way, Granny."

name: タエ
message: "What?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I've been getting these really awful headaches lately. I've been taking my meds like usual, but it's not working."
Granny finally pulls her eyes off the TV to look at me.
She's always told me to let her know if anything changes with my headaches.

name: タエ
message: "It's not working at all?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I don't know about 'at all,' but it's definitely worse than usual."

name: タエ
message: "I see. I'll try adjusting the formula a little."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I don't know what I'd do without you."
I bow deeply. Granny snorts, returning her attention to the TV.
Alright... So Koujaku's in my room.
I head upstairs.
My whole body throbs each time I take a step.
I may not have any visible injuries, but I feel a dull pain deep in my core.
Is it because I took damage in Rhyme?

name: 蒼葉
message: "For a fight that was all in my head, it sure hurts like a bitch..."
During that battle with that weird rabbit head guy, Ren said that the damage limits were disabled.
Is that even possible?
Despite the pain, I finish climbing the stairs and head into my room.
